Key Match Events: The Washington Wizards fell behind early after a sizzling start from the New Orleans Pelicans.
Pre-Game Insights: The Wizards' next game comes tomorrow when they take on the Houston Rockets.
Post-Match Reflections: Kyle Kuzma didn't like how the team played early on, and felt that it contributed to the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards' problems throughout most of the year have been linked to being unable to piece together longer runs of consistent play.
Others: The Wizards find themselves doing that only a fraction of the time. It hurts especially when they don't start out strong, like they did against the Pelicans on Sunday night.
